name: In re ESTATE of Peter BASALYGA, Deceased. Appeal of Gene BASALYGA

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re ESTATE of Peter BASALYGA, Deceased. Appeal of Gene BASALYGA.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
Costs on appellant.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gene Basalyga, I. P. P., for appellant.
Robert H. Sayers, Scranton, for appellee, Marie Asch, Extrx. of Est. of Peter Basalyga.
casebody.head_matter:
379 A.2d 305
In re ESTATE of Peter BASALYGA, Deceased. Appeal of Gene BASALYGA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 12, 1976.
Decided Oct. 28, 1977.
Gene Basalyga, I. P. P., for appellant.
Robert H. Sayers, Scranton, for appellee, Marie Asch, Extrx. of Est. of Peter Basalyga.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
